name: Sun Titan
oracle_text: Vigilance
Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: A blazing sun that never sets.

name: Somberwald Vigilante
oracle_text: Whenever Somberwald Vigilante becomes blocked by a creature, Somberwald Vigilante deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor_text: He has nothing left but his resentment.

name: Figure of Destiny
oracle_text: {R/W}: Figure of Destiny becomes a Kithkin Spirit with base power and toughness 2/2.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 4/4.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with base power and toughness 8/8, flying, and first strike.

name: Cavalry Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Cavalry Pegasus attacks, each attacking Human gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "It is hope, hooved and winged."—Cymede, queen of Akros

name: Fencing Ace
oracle_text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

name: Thraben Valiant
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: "Once more into Devil's Breach, soldiers. I want another devil tail for my collection."

name: Stun Sniper
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Stun Sniper deals 1 damage to target creature. Tap that creature.
flavor_text: The tips of her bolts are blunt, but her aim is deadly sharp.

name: Truefire Paladin
oracle_text: Vigilance
{R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Auramancer
oracle_text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

name: Freewind Equenaut
oracle_text: Flying
As long as Freewind Equenaut is enchanted, it has "{T}: Freewind Equenaut deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature."
flavor_text: Confront her, and feel the hooves of her steed. Ignore her, and feel the sting of her arrow.

name: Anax and Cymede
oracle_text: First strike, vigilance
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Anax and Cymede, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Akros's greatest heroes are also its royalty.

name: Armory Guard
oracle_text: Armory Guard has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.
flavor_text: The Dimir agents watched from the shadows. "Eight hours, and I've yet to see him blink," Nefara hissed. "I suggest we find another way in."

name: Gustcloak Sentinel
oracle_text: Whenever Gustcloak Sentinel becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.
flavor_text: Entire platoons have mysteriously vanished from battle, leaving enemy weapons to slice through empty air.

name: Dawnstrike Paladin
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: She crushes darkness beneath her charger's hooves.

name: Nobilis of War
oracle_text: Flying
Attacking creatures you control get +2/+0.
flavor_text: "A great siege is a banquet to him; a long and terrible battle, the most exquisite delicacy."—The Seer's Parables

name: Kamahl, Pit Fighter
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
{T}: Kamahl, Pit Fighter deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: In times when freedom seems lost, great souls arise to reclaim it.

name: Condemn
oracle_text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text: "No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now."—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

name: Daily Regimen
oracle_text: Enchant creature
{1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor_text: What self-indulgence tears down, discipline builds up again.

name: Pay No Heed
oracle_text: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.
flavor_text: "My course is before me. There is nothing behind me."

name: Righteousness
oracle_text: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Sometimes the greatest strength is the strength of conviction.

name: Stand Firm
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Magma Jet
oracle_text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Ordeal of Purphoros
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

name: Bonds of Faith
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.
flavor_text: "What cannot be destroyed will be bound."—Oath of Avacyn

name: Moment of Heroism
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

name: Undying Rage
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
When Undying Rage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Undying Rage to its owner's hand.

name: Battle Mastery
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: "Boom! Boom! Boots the size of oxcarts, then an axe like a falling sun. Elves scattered. Trees scattered. Even the hills ran for the hills!"—Clachan Tales

name: Griffin Guide
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
When enchanted creature dies, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.

name: Smite the Monstrous
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: Though the old holy wards and roadside shrines have begun to fail, faith in Avacyn still holds true power.

name: Miraculous Recovery
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: "I am the rock of the polis. Death only strengthens me."

name: Winds of Rath
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures that aren't enchanted. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: "There shall be a vast shout and then a vaster silence."—Oracle en-Vec

name: Pyrokinesis
oracle_text: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay Pyrokinesis's mana cost.
Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

name: Boros Guildgate
oracle_text: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Enter with merciful hearts. Exit with battle cries.

name: New Benalia
oracle_text: New Benalia enters the battlefield tapped.
When New Benalia enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

name: Polukranos, World Eater
oracle_text: {X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

When Polukranos, World Eater becomes monstrous, it deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures your opponents control. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to Polukranos.

name: Orcish Lumberjack
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool.
flavor_text: "Wood is wasted in the dirt."―Orcish proverb

name: Deadly Recluse
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Even dragons fear its silken strands.

name: Kavu Predator
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever an opponent gains life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Kavu Predator.
flavor_text: In a withered world, the scent of healthy prey is enough to drive a predator to frenzy.

name: Satyr Hedonist
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Satyr Hedonist: Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.
flavor_text: "Any festival you can walk away from wasn't worth attending in the first place."

name: Zhur-Taa Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Whenever you tap Zhur-Taa Druid for mana, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: "Only the decadent think magic should be pristine and without cost."

name: Blood Ogre
oracle_text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

name: Troll Ascetic
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate Troll Ascetic.
flavor_text: It's no coincidence that the oldest trolls are also the angriest.

name: Crowned Ceratok
oracle_text: Trample
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor_text: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

name: Gorehorn Minotaurs
oracle_text: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text: Some of the eleven minotaur clans of Mirtiin are expert crafters and learned philosophers. Others just like to hit stuff.

name: Ghor-Clan Savage
oracle_text: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text: The snap of sinew. The crunch of bone. A cry for mercy. These are the music of the Gruul.

name: Deus of Calamity
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Deus of Calamity deals 6 or more damage to an opponent, destroy target land that player controls.
flavor_text: "He bears the marks of ages upon his skin, memories of dreams long dead and best left buried."—The Seer's Parables

name: Conquering Manticore
oracle_text: Flying
When Conquering Manticore enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: It speaks no commands but is always obeyed.

name: Crater Hellion
oracle_text: Echo {4}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Crater Hellion enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to each other creature.

name: Skarrgan Firebird
oracle_text: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
Flying
{R}{R}{R}: Return Skarrgan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if an opponent was dealt damage this turn.

name: Valley Rannet
oracle_text: Mountaincycling {2}, forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Krosan Tusker
oracle_text: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Skarrgan Skybreaker
oracle_text: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
{1}, Sacrifice Skarrgan Skybreaker: Skarrgan Skybreaker deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.
flavor_text: "The sky isn't falling—it's being thrown at us!"—Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

name: Shower of Sparks
oracle_text: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player.
flavor_text: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error—mostly error.

name: Prey Upon
oracle_text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: "You don't find many old werewolf hunters."—Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

name: Pyroclasm
oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
flavor_text: "Who'd want to ignite things one at a time?"—Chandra Nalaar

name: Regrowth
oracle_text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: While the root remains, the tree yet lives.

name: Terrifying Presence
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by creatures other than target creature this turn.
flavor_text: Elmut had slaughtered vampires, slain werewolves, and destroyed hordes of zombies. Sadly, he never got over his fear of spiders.

name: Destructive Revelry
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Destructive Revelry deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
flavor_text: "Stoke a fire hot enough and you'll never run out of things to burn."—Xenagos, the Reveler

name: Dragon Blood
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: A single drop turns skin to scale and fist to claw.

name: Volt Charge
oracle_text: Volt Charge deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

name: Beast Within
oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor_text: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them."―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

name: Fires of Yavimaya
oracle_text: Creatures you control have haste.
Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Yavimaya lights the quickest path to battle.

name: Kazandu Refuge
oracle_text: Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

name: Llanowar Reborn
oracle_text: Llanowar Reborn enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Graft 1 (This land enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this land onto it.)

name: Skarrg, the Rage Pits
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: "This palace will be our fire-spit, and roasted prince our victory meal. Send in the torch-pigs!"—Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

oracle_text: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)
